column5: I Believe   Good karma your way Chris!

Reading Davis Battah's post (see below) on the pinned "Summer to Remember" post got me to thinking.   I have added the word BELIEVE to my signature and urge others to do so as well. Everytime you read a post with it in the signature, it will be reminder for people to keep young Chris in their thoughts.
Done. I have a couple close friends that have beat the odds, and a constant belief was the remedy.
Great idea Roger!    "Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all."~Dale Carnegie

Hey Roger this does sound like a good thing you have brought up. Chris and the others need our thoughts everyday and this is a great reminder to us all that sometimes get caught up in our own lives and forget for a moment that there are others that realy need our thoughts.
Great idea Davis! I'm not a religious person but I do BELIEVE that positive thoughs by many can have a positive effect!
Done, we are all family.  Regards, Sam, Laurie, Andrew and Hunter
Done  If I could I would post a link to one of my favorite songs.  Anyone care to help me with posting a song here
What a GREAT bunch of people we have here  DONE
You guys/gals never cease to amaze me.  Again, many many thanks.  Rob, Chris and Nicole

Just getting to read about Chris's Story. One of my friends from this board I fish with alot has told me about Chris battle over the last little while. I do not get to post as much as I would like but always read. I would like to say to Chris and his family I BELIEVE. Sometimes it is all we have and knowone can take it from us. Wishing you the best.  John.    BELIEVE
How the heck do you make it red?  Joey
I'm on board. Great idea Roger.
Done - And what a great idea!   Don
Joey, to make it red (or any coulour) look on the edit signature screen - there is an icon in the form of the letter 'A'.  It is beside the area where you choose your font.
